entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is being addressed by Dumbledore and is expected to carry out a task for him. ("This being the case, Harry... You understand?")

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is giving commands to Harry and has a potion that might cause him unendurable pain. ("You remember, the condition on which I brought you with me?... You swore, did you not, to follow any command I gave you?")

relationships.description: Dumbledore is giving a command to Harry. ("You remember... You swore, did you not, to follow any command I gave you?")
